columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN of the AWS SES identity.

columns.name: verification_status
columns.description: The verification status of the identity.

columns.description: The verification token for a domain identity.

columns.description: The DKIM attributes for an email address or a domain.

columns.name: notification_attributes
columns.description: Represents the notification attributes of an identity.
